result.execSummary:
The defendant Christopher J. Mott #00363103 was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC (2nd+ Offense), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt. 

$280 costs assessed from count 4.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Submit to random urine screens and pay for same.

Maintain absolute sobriety.

Submit a DNA sample and pay surcharge.
AODA assessment and follow through counseling.
Maintain full-time employment, schooling or a combination of both.

supervisions.notes:
Under the Huber Law. 

Concurrent with the defendant's current sentence.
$280 court costs to be paid during the period of probation on count 3.

ADDRESS INFO for Christopher J. Mott
Current: c/o Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 01-21-2022)
Prior: 1914 12Th St, Two Rivers, WI 54241
Re:  Possess methamphetamine as repeater, on 01-18-22.
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of possess methamphetamine, repeater, possess fentanyl, possess THC and possess drug paraphernalia.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 01-24-22 at 1:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $300.00 cash bond with the conditions that defendant is not to possess any controlled substance and defendant must maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol and drugs.  Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded to the custody of the Sheriff.
Minutes.
